title: cite
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The HTML <cite> tag represents the title of a creative work (e.g. a book, movie, poem, song, painting, sculpture, etc.)

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: Using <cite> tag to mark up a title
usageExamples.code: I read the book The Great Gatsby last week.

usageExamples.title: Example 2
usageExamples.description: Using <cite> tag for a song title
usageExamples.code: Have you heard the song Bohemian Rhapsody by Queen?
